restaurantDescription: Menukort is a restaurant located in the heart of Helsingør, Denmark. With a cozy atmosphere and a menu full of delicious options, it's a great place to enjoy a meal with family and friends. They offer a variety of dishes, including classic Danish cuisine and international favorites. Some popular options on the menu include their famous beef tartare, crispy pork belly, and fresh seafood dishes. They also have a selection of vegetarian and vegan options for those with dietary restrictions
weddingDescription: Helsingør Town Hall Saturday 29th July 2023 at 11:00am
title: You're invited to our wedding!
subtitle: There is nothing that would make us happier than sharing this moment of love and joy with you. Your presence is an invaluable gift and will make this special day even more memorable. Even for those who cannot be physically present, a live stream will be available five minutes before the ceremony at the link above. Join us in this celebration of love and commitment.
inviteCerimony: Please join us for our wedding ceremony.
inviteReception: Please join us for a celebratory meal.
